doc:
Bob Burns (humorist) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Burns_(humorist) 0 Robin "Bob" Burns (August 2, 1890 – February 2, 1956) was an American musical comedian, who appeared on radio and in movies from 1930 to 1947. Burns played a novelty musical instrument of his own invention, which he called a "bazooka". During World War II, the US Army's handheld anti-tank rocket launcher was nicknamed the "bazooka". Robin_"_Bob_"_Burns ( August_2_,_1890 – February_2_,_1956 ) was an_American_musical_comedian , who appeared on radio and in movies from 1930 to 1947 . Burns played a_novelty_musical_instrument of his_own_invention , which he called a_"_bazooka_" . During World_War_II , the_US_Army 's_handheld_anti-tank_rocket_launcher was_nicknamed the_"_bazooka_" .
